Reviews.Title: Not to Shabby for the price
Reviews.Author: rafink
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from another site and i can safely say this TV is most certainly a bang for your buck. I use it for my Xbox (With HDMI), netflix, Tv etc... The picture quality is absolutely amazing, remote is slim and functions, the TV is extremely light for added convenience , and includes most important jacks and hookups. At the end of every session of use, i simply cannot believe the TV is offered at this price. Another key feature i forgot to mention is the fact that this TV is LED. Meaning new technology, more sharp images and energy saving technology. The back states it only costs $9 to power this TV for a year, calculated with 5 hrs of use daily. Cool :)

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: John in Virginia
Reviews.Content: Very easy set up.  Great picture and vivid colors.  Excellent buy especially for the price.  Very thin and light weight. Arrived on time and well protected packaging.  I hooked it up to an HD cable box with HD cable jacks. Outstanding product.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.
Reviews.Author: MikeyLikesIt "Mike"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom and have it hooked up only to the regular, digital cable. In other words, I'm not using an HD input. The picture is fantastic. The sound is great. The remote works well. If you are looking for an inexpensive TV that will give excellent performance, this is it. If you hook it up to an HD input I'm thinking you will be exceptionally pleased.

Reviews.Title: Proscan
Reviews.Author: Mary Martinez
Reviews.Content: Great picture, not so great sound. Easy to set up. Nice design, very slim. Very fast delivery. If only the sound was better.

Reviews.Title: nice picture
Reviews.Author: William K. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Extremely happy with picture quality. Found same as other reviews that sound is just acceptable used in master bedroom and is wellworth the price.

Reviews.Title: High quality TV for a lower than average price.
Reviews.Author: J. Price "wyrewizard"
Reviews.Content: I like this TV for its good picture and low power consumption.  The only problem I have is HDMI sound is all echoey and metallic sounding.  So I bought separate speakers for my computer.

Reviews.Title: Ok but came with blue line down the center
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: The TV was adequate BUT......there was a one huge blue line of down the center of the screen as I turned it on out of the box.  I called the customer service rep, they sent another one out right away.  The 2nd one was great, no issues with TV.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for gaming or bedroom
Reviews.Author: Rosaline Andino
Reviews.Content: Purchased for our children's playroom to play xbox, wii etc. It was easy to set up. Sound is better than we expected and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: Good looking  Proscan Slim led tv
Reviews.Author: justino serrano
Reviews.Content: I like this it was on sale on this holiday I want for a gift to some one, is look berry good,I recommend to any one  is o k.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Parker
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to use with my wireless Uverse so that I could watch baseball or football on my patio and it works great! For the money this TV has great clear video!

Reviews.Title: Great picture sound not so great.
Reviews.Author: M. Sullivan "Live Life"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for an exercise room. I can't complain about the picture. It is fine. The sound is not so great as it is missing base. It really becomes apparent when you hear men talk. The TV does allow you to customize many things including the sound. I have the base all the way up 100% and the treble at 75%. This makes the sound passable. I believe some other people in their reviews said the sound was good, maybe they live in a high pitch world.The TV is easy to setup. The remote is a little funky. No menu button instead it is called Home. The buttons are on the small side. Would I get this again, I don't know. I would shop some more and maybe get something else, but I find TVs often have their quirks. I can live with the ones on this one for what I use it for.Update:After 3 months of little use the TV went kaput. Screen does not light up; no sound; blue bottom light is on all the time (does not turn red). I can unplug TV overnight, plug it back in, and the TV turns on like normal. Turn it off -blue light still on.  Try turning it on again- Screen does not light up; no sound; blue bottom light is on.I called customer service which went to a call center in India. Not to much problems just some problems understanding the person. I have now sent it to warranty $43 dollars shipping. Warranty goes to:Hyper Microsystems100 Lakeview ParkwayVernon, IL 60061So when considering whether to buy this TV factor in about 40 to 50 bucks and see if you can get a better and more reliable TV. Maybe more if you factor in hassle and down time.Save your box and packing material for the length of your warranty time on any TV you purchase that and is shipped to you. I had did and am glad for at least that.

Reviews.Author: Jamie B.
Reviews.Content: Really nice picture, I love the fact that you can hook up an USB to it. It can hook up to the computer as a monitor, But I have not tried it yet.  Good stuff.

Reviews.Title: Nice  for the price
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: So  far  this  has  been  a  good  choice;  it  was  easy  to  set  up  and  works  well . The picture  and  sound are fine.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Notposting Realname
Reviews.Content: I grew tired of watching DVDs on my old 26" Sony CRT TV, and so decided to upgrade.  This Proscan has a nice look, small footprint, and a decent 720p picture.  HOWEVER, as other customers commented, the built-in speakers leave very much to be desired.  If you're going directly out to a home entertainment system, the tinny-sounding built-ins won't be an issue.  If you're not, you might want to pick-up some speakers.  Also, it is available a little cheaper from other online vendors.

Reviews.Title: 6 months
Reviews.Author: David Quinn Jr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as a Christmas present.  It died in June.  Screen just went black, then blue with Proscan burned into the screen.  Please don't purchase this TV, you will definitely regret it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Graphics and Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: I received this tv as a Christmas gift last year and I could not be happier with it. The graphics and sound quality are excellent, and it is an amazing size for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: bill b.
Reviews.Content: this was my first flat screen tv and i dont know jack about them. it is great only the sound is not I got a $50 sound thing for it and I am set to go

Reviews.Title: Will not last
Reviews.Author: mjoy61
Reviews.Content: After 10 months of service it will not boot up. Fabulous if you enjoy staring at a blank screen. Do not waste your money. It will not last a year.

Reviews.Title: LEDTV
Reviews.Author: Lexie Magnan
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED TV.I luv the clarity and they are so much cheaper now.I use this for my bedroom and not the big play room.

Reviews.Title: Awful sound!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the price, but the sound is terrible!  Very "tin-like".  I have adjusted all settings but nothing worked.  I have it connected to the internet through my ROKU.  I like to play internet radio, but music sounds awful through this TV.  Also if I raise the volume over the first 4 marks, I sound get static-y.  I will probably return it.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: OK, not great
Reviews.Author: T. Graves
Reviews.Content: The picture is not as good as some $200 HDTVs. I just bought the Coby 32" one and it has a better picture although the resolution isn't as good (but on one this size it isn't a big deal) and it cost less. The picture seems to me to have the painted effect the early gen LCDs has for some of the 480p broadcasts.The input connections are awfully close together and getting the cable connected next to the audio in for the PC is a tight fit. Ditto with the VGA cable connector.The tuner doesn't work as well as other TVs I own and it has problems picking up the same over the air signal from the same antenna that the other TVs can grab.And the sound is terrible for a TV. Very tinny.

ProductInfo.Features:
32-Inch Ultra Slim LED HD TV - Wall Mountable (mount not included)
Built in USB Port:  Connections: HDMI (2), VGA, YPbPR, AV Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, Component and RF.
Digital ATSC tuning for the best signal reception.
Digital Comb Filter, Bass, Treble and Balance Controls
Includes Full function remote control
ProductInfo.Name: Proscan PLED3204A 32-Inch 60Hz Ultra Slim LED HDTV
